target-order.description: Sort strategy for the list elements on the right: if 'original', keep the same order as the data source; If it's 'push', the new element will be added last; If it's 'unshift', the new element will be added first
target-order.description_zh: 右侧列表元素的排序策略：若为 `original`，则保持与数据源相同的顺序；若为 `push`，则新加入的元素排在最后；若为 `unshift`，则新加入的元素排在最前

:render-content.description_zh: 自定义数据项渲染函数

:format.description: Select the status text at the top of the list
:format.description_zh: 列表顶部勾选状态文案

:props.description: The field alias of the data source

:left-default-checked.description: An array of keys with checks in the left list in the initial state
:left-default-checked.description_zh: 初始状态下左侧列表的已勾选项的 key 数组

:right-default-checked.description: An array of keys with checked options in the list on the right in the initial state
:right-default-checked.description_zh: 初始状态下右侧列表的已勾选项的 key 数组

methods.name: clearQuery
methods.description: Clear the search keywords for a panel
methods.description_zh: 清空某个面板的搜索关键词

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the list element on the right changes
events.params: 当前值、数据移动的方向（'left' / 'right'）、发生移动的数据 key 数组
events.description_zh: 右侧列表元素变化时触发

events.name: left-check-change
events.description: Triggered when the left list element is selected/unchecked by the user
events.params: 当前被选中的元素的 key 数组、选中状态发生变化的元素的 key 数组
events.description_zh: 左侧列表元素被用户选中 / 取消选中时触发

events.name: right-check-change
events.description: Triggered when the list element on the right is selected/unchecked by the user
events.params: 当前被选中的元素的 key 数组、选中状态发生变化的元素的 key 数组
events.description_zh: 右侧列表元素被用户选中 / 取消选中时触发

slots.name: left-footer
slots.description: What's at the bottom of the list on the right

slots.name: right-footer
slots.description: What's at the bottom of the list on the right
